trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around August 7th 1989
Summary: me and my dad were leaving cousins house, pulled up to hwy 193 and saw UFO. vehicle desencded to us and creatures approached us.
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my dad were leaving our cousins house at the port of Catoosa in Oklahoma. We had pulled up to the edge of the road(HWY 193), Thats when i noticed what looked like an egg shaped ,but also saucer shaped vehicle in the sky, hovering above the ground. It was making no noise, but was emitting a variety of orbs and beams of light. I knew immediatly that this was no helicopter or airplane. I was very frightened. But i could not look away. We never lost sight of the craft. After a few minutes , the craft approached our car and then there were four to five beings standing around our car. We were taken aboard their craft and i believe that we were implanted with some sort of device. I still to this day have the device in my arm. and would be willing to have it removed for research sake. THIS IS NOT A HOAX OR ATTEMPT TO GET "15 MINUTES OF FAME" These were very real occurances and would like very much to speak with MUFON about what to do, as i am plagued everyday about what happened to me and my father. Thank you for your time, Michael J Thomas 918-592-4925
